company: UITS- University of Information Technology & Sciences
title: IT Officer
description: As a Project Manager (PM) Intern within the ICT Cell at UITS University, my primary responsibility revolves around ensuring the seamless operation and enhancement of the University's UCAM (University Centralized Admission Management) and Admission Site. This pivotal role involves effective communication with our software solution provider, EDUSOFT, to address any technical issues and implement necessary upgrades or modifications to the system.
